channel.title: EF Core on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in EF Core on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: dotnet: Secure and Intelligent: Queryable Encryption and Vector Search in MongoDB EF Core Provider
item.description:
The MongoDB EF Core provider adds support for Queryable Encryption and Vector Search, letting .NET developers encrypt sensitive data while still running queries against it and build AI-powered semantic search applications directly using EF Core.

  • Source: .NET

item.title: dotnet: EFCore.Visualizer â€“ View Entity Framework Core query plan inside Visual Studio
item.description:
EFCore.Visualizer is a Visual Studio extension that lets developers visualize and analyze Entity Framework Core query execution plans directly inside the IDE.

  • Source: .NET
